events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
System assigned the cluster 'Refund' based on the customer's request for money back and order issue.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with the refund for your order.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
My order number is 987654321. I have attached the photo showing that the item is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund immediately and provide a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate you handling this so promptly.
The refund has been processed, and the return label has been emailed to you. Please send back the wrong item at your convenience.
Just checking in to ensure that you received your refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since we have not heard back from you, we are closing this case. Please do not hesitate to contact us again if you need further assistance.
